ch0119_10_gladion/0101_0701_02_10:
You and I should do what we need to get
done today...
ch0119_10_gladion/7101_0701_01_10:
Hm? I look different than usual...but it’s a good
look on me?
ch0119_10_gladion/7101_0701_03_10:
I guess I should make sure a Pokémon doesn’t rip
this outfit, then.
ch0119_10_gladion/7102_0701_01_10: It’s not bad, battling by your side...
ch0119_10_gladion/7102_0701_02_10:
But we’re also competing with each other to be
the best sync pair.
ch0119_10_gladion/7102_0701_03_10:
If you and I ever do face off, I’ll come at you with
my full power.
ch0119_10_gladion/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m used to taking care of my outfits... What, is
that a surprise?
ch0119_10_gladion/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s a sign of me and my partner’s trust in each
other—I have to make sure it lasts.
ch0119_10_gladion/7104_0701_01_10:
Did you know Magearna is an artificial Pokémon
that was built by humans a long time ago?
ch0119_10_gladion/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... What do you hope
to achieve by becoming strong?
ch0119_10_gladion/7105_0701_02_10:
I wanted strength so I could protect my sister,
even if it meant I had to beat up everyone else.
ch0119_10_gladion/7105_0701_03_10:
But my sister taught me about another type of
strength—the strength that comes from kindness...
ch0119_10_gladion/7105_0701_04_10:
You’re a bit like her, with your empathy and
kindness towards Pokémon.
ch0119_10_gladion/7105_0701_05_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing what path you’ll end
up choosing.
ch0119_10_gladion/1701_0701_01_10: I have something for you... Here, take it.
ch0119_10_gladion/1701_0702_01_10:
Hmph... How you use items shows a lot about
your skills.
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0701_01_10: A new antique shop opened the other day.
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0701_02_10: I think Magearna’s interested in it.
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0701_03_10:
But it’s hard for me to enter a shop like that
by myself. If you could come with me, I’d
appreciate it...
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0702_01_10: I have to buy a present for Lillie and my mom.
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0702_02_10: That said, I don’t know what to get them...
ch0119_10_gladion/2501_0702_03_10:
I can’t even pick a present for my family...
How pathetic...
ch0119_10_gladion/2511_0701_01_10:
You’re always so busy, running around all over
the place.
ch0119_10_gladion/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s fine if you like to explore, but be sure not to
wear out your partner Pokémon.
ch0119_10_gladion/2511_0701_03_10:
Though...I’m sure I don’t need to worry about you
doing that.
ch0119_10_gladion/2511_0702_01_10:
You’ve got a great partner. Make sure you keep
it healthy.
ch0119_10_gladion/2511_0702_02_10:
It makes me happy when I see you and your
partner Pokémon are both doing great.
ch0119_10_gladion/3001_0701_01_10:
Hmph. Stop spacing out. Just ’cause it’s morning
doesn’t mean you can let your guard down.
ch0119_10_gladion/3003_0701_01_10:
Take a journey to train yourself. You won’t be
disappointed with the results.
ch0119_10_gladion/3005_0701_01_10:
We’re a sync pair that shines bright through
the darkness of night.
